mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS course_id,c.name AS course_name,c.cover AS cover,(SELECT COUNT(cc.id) FROM course_classes cc WHERE cc.course_id = c.id AND ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) = 0 OR (SELECT MAX(ccp.date) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) >= DATE(NOW()))) AS class_count FROM course c WHERE c.institution_id = #{1} AND c.course_type_id = #{0}

SELECT c.id AS course_id,c.name AS course_name,c.cover AS cover,cc.id AS class_id,cc.name AS class_name,u.id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name FROM user u JOIN course_classes cc ON u.id = cc.user_id JOIN course c ON cc.course_id = c.id WHERE (u.name = #{1} OR u.phone = #{1}) AND u.type = 2 AND (SELECT DAYOFYEAR(MAX(ccp.date)) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) >= DAYOFYEAR(NOW()) AND c.institution_id = #{0}

SELECT c.id AS course_id,c.name AS course_name,c.cover AS cover, cc.id AS class_id,cc.name AS class_name,u.id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name,u.phone AS phone FROM course c JOIN course_classes cc ON c.id = cc.course_id JOIN user u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{0}

SELECT cc.course_id AS course_id,cc.id AS class_id,cc.name AS class_name, u.name AS user_name,u.phone AS user_phone, (SELECT COUNT(ccp.id) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) AS plan_count FROM course_classes cc JOIN user u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.course_id = #{courseId} AND (SELECT MAX(ccp.date) FROM course_classes_plan ccp WHERE ccp.course_classes_id = cc.id) < DATE(NOW()) LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT url FROM course_classes_img WHERE class_id = #{classId}

SELECT cc.id AS id,null AS institution_name,cc.user_id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name,cc.name AS `name`,cc.start_time AS start_time,cc.end_time AS end_time, cc.start_date AS start_date,cc.end_date AS end_date,cc.plan_count AS plan_count, cc.student_count AS student_count,cc.price AS price FROM course_classes cc JOIN `user` u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT cc.*,i.name AS institution_name, u.name AS user_name,u.photo AS user_photo,u.interest AS interest,u.short_introduction AS short_introduction FROM course_classes cc JOIN institution i ON cc.institution_id = i.id JOIN `user` u ON cc.user_id = u.id WHERE cc.id = #{0}

SELECT cc.id AS id,i.name AS institution_name,cc.cover AS cover,cc.user_id AS user_id,u.name AS user_name,cc.name AS `name`,cc.start_time AS start_time,cc.end_time AS end_time, cc.start_date AS start_date,cc.end_date AS end_date,cc.plan_count AS plan_count, cc.student_count AS student_count,cc.price AS price FROM course_classes cc JOIN `user` u ON cc.user_id = u.id JOIN institution i ON cc.institution_id = i.id WHERE cc.course_id = #{courseId} LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT cc.id AS id,cc.cover AS cover,cc.name AS `name`, cc.plan_count AS plan_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM course_classes_sign ccs WHERE ccs.classes_id = cc.id) AS student_count,i.name AS institution_name FROM course_classes cc JOIN institution i ON cc.institution_id = i.id WHERE cc.user_id = #{0} AND cc.start_date <= DATE(#{1}) AND cc.end_date >= DATE(#{1}) ORDER BY cc.start_time

SELECT cc.`id` AS class_id,cc.`address` AS address,cc.`name` AS class_name, cc.`start_time` AS start_time,cc.`end_time` AS end_time,i.`name` AS institution_name, cc.cover AS cover FROM course_classes cc JOIN institution i ON cc.`institution_id` = i.`id` WHERE cc.`user_id` = #{0} AND cc.`start_date` <= DATE(#{1}) AND cc.`end_date` >= DATE(#{1}) ORDER BY cc.start_time
